# TypeFuzz

TypeScript-first fuzz/property testing utilities with Vitest/Jest adapters.

## Primary docs

- README: ./README.md
- Documentation index: ./docs/index.md
- AI testing playbook: ./docs/ai-testing-playbook.md
- Core API guide: ./docs/core-api.md
- Generators guide: ./docs/generators.md
- Test runner integrations: ./docs/test-runners.md
- Model-based testing: ./docs/model-based-testing.md
- Zod adapter: ./docs/zod-adapter.md
- Shrinking and replay: ./docs/shrinking-and-replay.md
- FAQ: ./docs/faq.md
- Releasing: ./docs/releasing.md
- Agent instructions: ./AGENTS.md

## Project commands

- bun install
- bun run lint
- bun run typecheck
- bun run test
- bun run release patch|minor|major
- bun run release:tag
